conversion_verification.notes: The model successfully transitions from a 2D floor plan to an isometric 3D cutaway.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D depth and wall geometry. Minor perspective haziness in some internal corners.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Major layout deviation. The 3D model adds multiple rooms and walls not present in the original open-concept plan.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture is present but does not align with the 2D layout (e.g., a bed is added where no bedroom was specified).

visual_clarity.notes: Good architectural style and color coherence, though some internal details are blurry.

detected_errors.description: The 3D model introduces several internal partition walls and additional rooms (likely bedrooms) not found in the original floor plan.
The stairs from the original plan are entirely missing in the 3D render.

summary: While the 3D conversion is technically sound and visually appealing, it fails the fidelity test by inventing a complex room layout that contradicts the simple 2D source plan.
